title: AKAINU IS BEAST! One Piece Ep 463/464 Reaction
author: Bilibili Content Creator
description: A reaction video to One Piece episodes 463 and 464, featuring Akainu's power reveal and Little Oars Jr.'s entrance. The reactor expresses amazement at Akainu's devastating magma abilities.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Episode 464 of the Marineford Arc

title: Admiral Akainu Power Revealed | One Piece Episodes 463-464 (Uncut) Reaction
author: Timberzy
description: Uncut reaction to episodes 463-464 of One Piece featuring Admiral Akainu's magma power reveal. The creator describes these episodes as 'completely insane' and showcases Akainu's devastating abilities.

title: WHITEBEARD ARRIVES AT MARINEFORD! One Piece Episode 459, 460, 461, 462, 463 REACTION!!!
author: Anime Uprising
description: A comprehensive reaction video covering the opening episodes of the Marineford War, including Episode 463 where Akainu reveals his powers and Little Oars Jr. arrives.

title: One Piece – 463
author: Random Curiosity
description: An episode review published shortly after the original air date, providing detailed analysis of Episode 463 including Akainu's power reveal and the battle developments.

title: 462-463: 'The Force That Could Destroy the World! the Power of the Tremor-Tremor Fruit' and 'An All-Encompassing Inferno!! Admiral Akainu's Power!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog post from someone watching One Piece for the first time, reacting to episodes 462-463. The author notes that Akainu 'punched the iceberg out of the sky and rained literal fire and brimstone down upon the Whitebeard pirates.'

title: One Piece – Marineford Arc (Episodes 457 – 491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Marineford Arc including Episode 463's pivotal moments with Akainu's power reveal and the escalating battle.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full Marineford Arc review with spoilers through Episode 491

title: One Piece: Akainu's Magu Magu no Mi, Explained
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An in-depth analysis article explaining Akainu's Magu Magu no Mi Devil Fruit powers, including discussion of its first reveal in Episode 463 when he destroyed Jozu's ice block.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis of Akainu's powers throughout the series

title: The One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Marineford Arc (According To IMDb)
author: CBR Editorial
description: An article ranking the best episodes of the Marineford Arc based on IMDb ratings. Episode 463 is noted for its 9.2 rating and significance in revealing Akainu's devastating powers.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses best episodes throughout the Marineford Arc
